about_the_game:
Discover the world of perfect long hairstyles in the Hairdresser Simulator Long Hair DLC! Earn the title of the best stylist in town by mastering the art of long hair and crafting unique styles. To achieve this, you'll need to meet the diverse demands of your clients—some will want flowing, movie-star locks, while others will crave bold, creative cuts.

Master the art of long hair!

Maintaining long hair in top shape requires precision and care, and creating unique hairstyles demands the right tools. In the Long Hair DLC, you'll have access to a full set of professional hairdressing tools that will help you fulfill even the most extravagant hair requests from your clients.

Create your own, stylish salon!

Your salon is a reflection of your skills and style, so it’s time to open and design your own professional space dedicated to long hairstyles. Decorate and personalize your salon with a range of new decor items, making it the go-to place for clients with long hair.

Say goodbye to split ends on your long hair

No more uneven, damaged locks! Smooth out your clients’ hair, repair split ends, and define your own styling rules. Whether it's voluminous curls or sleek, straight strands, everything is now within your grasp.

Set new trends!

You’re in charge now—cut, style and color long hair to create the latest trends that will take over the city. Your salon will become the hot spot for everyone looking for a fresh new look. Become the trendsetter in the world of long hairstyles!

  • Ability to cut and style long hair

  • 20 new, diverse hairstyles to choose from, including styles like Butterfly Cut, Curtain Bangs with Layers, Wolf Cut and more!

  • 1 brand-new pastel-themed salon set by the seaside, offering a serene and relaxing atmosphere for your clients.

  • Three new storyline characters, each bringing unique challenges and stories to the salon.

  • 10 new items to decorate your salon!
